SEND.LABEL: Label
SEND.LABELPLACEHOLDER: Shigar da lakabin don wannan adireshin don ƙara shi zuwa littafin adireshinku
SEND.SELECTINPUTSTITLE: Zaži Bayanan Don Yi amfani da Shi
SEND.INPUTLOCKED: An kulle shigarwa. Dole ne ku buše wannan shigarwar don ku ciyar da shi.
SEND.ALERTFEECHANGECONTENT: Ainihin ma'amala ma'amala ya fi yadda aka sa ran. Da fatan a tabbatar da sabon farashi:

STAKING.NOTENABLEDINFO: Ba a halin yanzu saɓo ba.
STAKING.NOTENABLEDINSTR: A kan gungumen da za ku buƙaci don taimakawa wajen kafa stane = 1 a cikin fayil na metrix.conf.
STAKING.NOTSTAKINGTITLE: Walat ba ta yin tsalle ba
STAKING.NOTSTAKINGINFO: Waƙa a yanzu ana kulle wajanka.
STAKING.NOTSTAKINGINSTR: Zaka iya farawa ta hanyar cirewa walat ɗinku don yin sauti

MASTERNODES.NOMNOUTPUTS: Ba'a sami ƙararrakin Masternode ba. Don gudanar da Masternode na gida aika tsabar kudi daidai 2,5,25,50 ko miliyan 100 zuwa adireshin Masternode kuma jira 15 tabbatarwa.
MASTERNODES.LOCALNOTRUNNING: Masternode na gida Ba Gudun ba
MASTERNODES.REMOTENOTRUNNING: Ba a Samu Masternode Mai Nisa ba

SIGNMESSAGE.SIGN_DESCRIPTION: Kuna iya sa hannu da sakonni tare da adiresoshin ku don tabbatar da ku mallake su. Yi la'akari da kada ku shiga wani abu mai banƙyama, kamar yadda masu tasowa na phishing za suyi kokarin gwada ku cikin sa hannu akan ainihin ku. Kawai zartar cikakkun bayanai da kuka yarda da su.
SIGNMESSAGE.VERIFY_DESCRIPTION: Shigar da adireshin sa hannu, sakon (tabbatar da kayi kariya ga fasali, sarari, shafuka, da dai sauransu.) Kuma sa hannu a ƙasa don tabbatar da sakon. Yi hankali kada ka ƙara karantawa a cikin sa hannu fiye da abin da ke cikin sakon da aka sa hannu, don kauce wa yaudarar kai tsaye tsakanin mutum.

DEBUG.CONSOLEINFO: Barka da zuwa ga Metrix Core RPC. Taimakon taimako don ƙarin bayani game da dokokin da aka samo.
DEBUG.CONSOLEWARNING: WARNING: Masu shafuka suna aiki, suna gaya wa masu amfani su rubuta umarni a nan, sata abubuwan da suke walat. Kada kayi amfani da wannan na'ura ba tare da cikakken fahimtar rakiyar umarni ba.

REPAIR.INFOEXTERNAL: Wadannan umarnin gyara ba za a iya gudana ba lokacin da Metrix Core ke gudana a waje
REPAIR.INFO: Abubuwan da ke ƙasa zasu sake farawa Metrix Core tare da zaɓuɓɓukan umarni don gyara walat, gyara al'amurra tare da fayilolin blockchain da ɓacewa ko ɓacewa.
REPAIR.SALVAGEINFO: -salvagewallet: Ƙoƙari ta dawo da maɓallin keɓaɓɓiyar maɓallin basira.
REPAIR.RESCANINFO: -rescan: Tsayar da blockchain don sadarwar kuɗi maras kyau.
REPAIR.RECOVER1INFO: -zapwallettxes = 1: Karɓo ma'amaloli daga blockchain (ci gaba da bayanan-bayanan, misali mai ba da labari)
REPAIR.RECOVER2INFO: -zapwallettxes = 2: Sauke ma'amaloli daga blockchain (sauke bayanan meta)
REPAIR.UPGRADEWALLETINFO: -upgradewallet: Haɓaka walat zuwa sabon tsarin kan farawa. (Lura: wannan ba BABA sabunta wajista kanta ba ne!)
REPAIR.REBUILDINDEXINFO: -reindex: Sake gina fasali mai launi daga fayilolin blk000 na yanzu.
REPAIR.BOOTSTRAPINFO: Zazzage fayilolin blockchain na Metrix daga metrixcoin.com kuma sanya ƙyallen shigarwa. Dogaro da haɗin cibiyar sadarwarka wannan na iya ɗaukar mintina 10 zuwa awanni kaɗan
REPAIR.SYNCFROMSTARTINFO: Share fayilolin blockchain na gida da resync ɗin daga katangar ɗan adam.
REPAIR.RESTARTCOREINFO: Sake kunna Metrix Core idan yana aiki ko fara Metrix Core idan baya gudana.
REPAIR.REINSTALLCOREINFO: Share ƙananan Metrix Core na gida kuma sake sanya shi daga sabobin Metrix.

EXPLORER.TITLE: Block Explorer
EXPLORER.SEARCHNORESULTS: An kasa samo wani asusun ko ma'amala da aka daidaita da bincikenka

NETWORK.PROXYTOR: Yi amfani da wakili na SOCKS5 da za a iya isa abokan hulɗa ta hanyar hidimar da aka ɓoye
NETWORK.ONLYNET: Kawai haɗi zuwa nodes a cikin cibiyar sadarwa
NETWORK.RESTARTREQUIRED: Ana buƙatar farawa na Abune don kunna kowane canje-canje a waɗannan saitunan.

WINDOW.MINIMIZETOTRAY: Rage raguwa zuwa tarkon a madadin taskbar

STATUS.UNLOCKEDSTAKING: Ba a kulle walat don yin kawai ba
STATUS.NOTSTAKING: Walat ba a halin yanzu ba
STATUS.MASTERNODEON: Masternode yana gudana a halin yanzu
STATUS.MASTERNODEOFF: Masternode ba a gudana a halin yanzu

PROMPT.ENTERPASSPHRASETITLE: Shigar da Kalmomin Fasal ɗinku na Wallet
PROMPT.CLIENTUPDATEINFO: An sabuntawa don Metrix Core. Kuna son shigar da shi a yanzu?
PROMPT.WALLETUPDATEINFO: Ana sabuntawa don Altitude. Kuna so ku sauke shi a yanzu?
PROMPT.CLIENTSTOPPEDINFO: An rasa haɗin zuwa ga Metrix Core. Za ka iya dakatar da walat ko fara Metrix Core na ciki.
PROMPT.ENCRYPTEDCONTENT: Duk wani bayanan da kuka riga kuka yi daga fayil dinku ya kamata a maye gurbin tare da sabon saiti, ɓoyayyen takarda. Don dalilai na tsaro, bayanan ajiyar baya na ajiyayyen bashin baƙaƙe ba zai zama mara amfani ba da zarar ka fara amfani da sabon walat ɓoyayyen.
PROMPT.CLIENTCLOSEDUNEXPECTEDTITLE: Metrix Core ya tsaya ba tare da tsammani ba
PROMPT.CLIENTCLOSEDUNEXPECTEDINFO: Akwai matsala tare da Metrix Core wanda ya sa ya ƙare. Ana bada shawara don bincika fayil ɗin debug.log ɗinku don al'amurran da suka shafi.
PROMPT.CLIENTINVALIDCONFIGINFO: metrix.conf naka yana da saiti mara kyau wanda zai sa Metrix Core ya fita nan da nan. Da fatan a duba wannan fayil.
PROMPT.ADDREMOTEMNIP: IP na Masternode: tashar jiragen ruwa
PROMPT.BOOTSTRAPFAILEDTITLE: Ba a yi nasarar Metrix Core Bootstrap ba
PROMPT.BOOTSTRAPFAILEDINFO: An sami matsala bootstrapping Metrix Core. Ana bada shawara don bincika fayil ɗin Altitude ɗinku don maganganu.
PROMPT.STARTUPFAILEDTITLE: Ba a yi nasarar Matrix Core Startre ba
PROMPT.STARTUPFAILEDINFO: Akwai fara Metrix Core. Ana bada shawara don bincika fayil ɗin Altitude ɗinku don maganganu.
PROMPT.CLIENTUNKNOWNERRORINFO: An sami matsala sadarwa tare da Metrix Core. Ana bada shawara don bincika fayil ɗin debug.log ɗinku don al'amurran da suka shafi.
PROMPT.UNENROLLGOVERNORTITLE: Tabbatar da Rashin shigar da Gwamna
PROMPT.UNENROLLGOVERNORCONTENT: Shin kun tabbata kuna son cire rajistar Gwamnan ku? Ba za ku ƙara samun damar yin zaɓe a kan tsarin mulki ba.

ADDRESSBOOK.TITLE: Littafin adireshi
ADDRESSBOOK.SENDINGINFO: Wadannan ana adana adireshin Metrix don aikawa biya. Koyaushe duba adadin da karɓar adireshin kafin aika tsabar kudi
ADDRESSBOOK.RECEIVINGINFO: Wadannan ana adana adireshin Metrix don samun biyan kuɗi.

MAINCHAINCHECK.ALERT: Gargadi! Ba ku cikin babban sarkar bisa ga binciken Metrix. An ba da shawarar sosai don sake sake daidaitawa ko sake haɗawa da blockchain ku don hana asarar kowane tsabar kuɗi.

NOTIFICATIONS.CREATEDNEWACCOUNT: Sabon asusun da aka samu nasara
NOTIFICATIONS.ADDRESSCOPIEDCLIPBOARD: Adireshin da aka kwafe zuwa takarda
NOTIFICATIONS.EMPTYFIELDS: Da fatan a cika dukkan fannoni
NOTIFICATIONS.PASSPHRASEMISMATCH: Fasforar da kuka shigar basu dace ba
NOTIFICATIONS.CHECKINGUPDATEFAILED: Ba a iya bincika sabuntawa ba. Duba cibiyar sadarwarka.
NOTIFICATIONS.SENDINGEXCEEDSBALANCE: Adadin da kake aikawa ya wuce kuɗin da aka zaba
NOTIFICATIONS.MISSINGCHANGEADDRESS: Dole ne ku sanya adireshin canji
NOTIFICATIONS.MISSINGDESTINATIONADDRESS: Dole ne ku sanya adireshin adireshin
NOTIFICATIONS.MISSINGAMOUNTTOSEND: Dole ne ku saka adadin da za a aika
NOTIFICATIONS.INSUFFICIENTBALANCE: Balajin da bai dace ba don kammala wannan ma'amala
NOTIFICATIONS.TRANSACTIONSENT: Ma'amala da aka aika da nasarar
NOTIFICATIONS.GENERICERROR: An sami kuskuren da ba a san ba. Kila iya buƙatar sake fara walat ɗin ku kuma sake gwadawa. Idan matsalolin matsaloli sun tuntuɓi goyan baya.
NOTIFICATIONS.SIGNEDMESSAGE: An sanya hannu a sanya hannu
NOTIFICATIONS.TRANSACTIONMISMATCH: Kuskuren kasuwanci. Da fatan a sake gwadawa.
NOTIFICATIONS.MINIMUMCONFIRMATIONS: Dukkan bayanai suna buƙatar akalla 1 tabbaci kafin jawabin.
NOTIFICATIONS.TRANSACTIONSCOPIEDCLIPBOARD: Ayyukan da aka kwafe zuwa takarda
NOTIFICATIONS.FAILEDTOWRITECONFIG: An sami matsala wajen rubuta fayil ɗin metrix.conf ɗinku. Duba fayil ɗin yana wanzu kuma Altitude yana da izini na izini.
NOTIFICATIONS.NOPUBLICUP: Ba a sami adireshin IP na Jama'a ba. Duba haɗin intanet ɗin ka kuma sake kunna Altitude.
NOTIFICATIONS.REPORTINGISSUE: Samun bayanan bincike... Za a kwafa wannan bayanin a cikin allo.

GOVERNANCE.NOTGOVERNORDETAIL: Gwamnonin suna da alhakin jefa ƙuri'a kan kasafin kuɗi na wata-wata da canje-canje na blockchain. Kuna iya zama gwamna ta hanyar kulle madaidaiciyar yarjejeniyar a kwangilar Gwamnatin.
GOVERNANCE.CONFIRMENROLL: Kun kusa yin rajista a matsayin Gwamna. Wannan zai aika da ma'amala tare da yarjejeniyar da ake buƙata zuwa kwangilar gudanar da mulki. Kuna iya rajista a kowane lokaci.
GOVERNANCE.ISGOVERNORDETAIL1: Gwamnonin suna da alhakin jefa ƙuri'a kan kasafin kuɗi na wata-wata da canje-canje na blockchain.
GOVERNANCE.ISGOVERNORDETAIL2: Don tsayar da gwamna kana buƙatar shiga cikin aƙalla 1 zaɓin kowace rana kwana 30.
GOVERNANCE.ISGOVERNORDETAIL3: Idan babu abun yin jefa kuri'a sannan zaka iya ci gaba da yiwa rajista hannu ta hanyar aika ping mai aiki.

BUDGET.TITLE: Kasafin Kudi
BUDGET.MINIMUMGOVERNORS: Ba za a iya zartar da kasafin kudi ba har sai mafi karancin adadin Gwamnoni da ke kan layin.

CREATEPROPOSAL.TITLE: Airƙiri shawara
CREATEPROPOSAL.DESCRIPTION: A ƙasa zaku iya ƙirƙirar ƙaddamar da kasafin kuɗi kuma ku gabatar da shi zuwa cibiyar sadarwa don jefa ƙuri'a kafin toshewar ƙaddamar da kasafin kuɗi na gaba.
CREATEPROPOSAL.BUDGETBLOCK: Lokaci na gaba na sulhu shine

NOTIFICATIONS.ALREADYHAVEADDRESS: Kuna da adireshin BTC da ke hade da wannan adireshin Metrix
NOTIFICATIONS.SWAPUSDMAX: Matsakaicin adadin canji na USD shine $ 3000
NOTIFICATIONS.INCOMPLETEFORM: Ba ku cika dukkan filayen da ake buƙata ba
NOTIFICATIONS.INVALIDPROPOSALDURATION: Dokokin bada shawara ya kamata ya kasance tsakanin wata 1 zuwa 12
NOTIFICATIONS.CREATINGPROPOSAL: Submitaddamar da gabatarwa zuwa hanyar sadarwa...
NOTIFICATIONS.CREATEDPROPOSAL: An kirkiro shawarwarin ku cikin nasara
NOTIFICATIONS.ENROLLEDGOVERNOR: Rijistar ku zata cika lokacin da aka tabbatar da ma'amalar ku
NOTIFICATIONS.VOTEDONPROPOSAL: Za'a kirga kuri'arku da zarar kasuwancin ya tabbatar.
NOTIFICATIONS.NOADDRESS: Ba ku shigar da adireshin Metrix ba
NOTIFICATIONS.PINGEDGOVERNOR: An aika Ping cikin nasara. Za a sabunta Gwamnan ku da zarar an tabbatar da ma'amala
NOTIFICATIONS.UNENROLLEDGOVERNOR: An aika ma'amala Za a yi rajistar Gwamnan ku da zarar an tabbatar da ma'amala
NOTIFICATIONS.GOVERNORNOTMATURE: Gwamnan ku bai isa ya aiwatar da wannan aikin ba tukunna
